allow:
Bash(git -C "J:\git\catapulte-autoplugin" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update phpcs.xml: fix text_domain and PHP version

- Change text_domain from wp-autoplugin to catapulte-autoplugin
- Update testVersion from 7.4- to 8.1- to match plugin requirements
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "J:\git\catapulte-autoplugin" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix PHP 8.3 TypeError in GitHub Updater version_compare()

- Add validation before version_compare() to ensure string arguments
- Return early if new_version or version is not a valid string
- Simplify README version fallback logic
EOF
)")
